originalText.text: It is high time for new leadership in District 2. Carlina Rivera is an opportunist and a liar. She has done nothing for her district, taken large donations from big developers, openly and shamefully promoting real estate interests, no matter how it affects the neighborhood (Tech Hub in Union Square, East River Park, etc ..). Say NO to Rivera on June 27. 2023.

text.text: It is high time for new leadership in District 2. Carlina Rivera is an opportunist and a liar. She has done nothing for her district, taken large donations from big developers, openly and shamefully promoting real estate interests, no matter how it affects the neighborhood (Tech Hub in Union Square, East River Park, etc ..). Say NO to Rivera on June 27. 2023.

originalText.text: Really Ms. Rivera? Dont you think you should answer emails sent to your office, particularly regarding vulnerable children? As you may already know, emails count as admissible evidence in court. If you're still a member of the New York Council please direct your office to follow-up with answering Constituents who send information to your office by electronic means which include emails.

originalText.text: I'd love to set up some tables, chairs, loud blasting speakers and drunk 20-somethings in front of your office for 3 years and see how you like outdoor dining then. Shame on you for not thinking about how the bill effects residents.

originalText.text: Five stars because  you stayed in the Progressive Caucus.  Thank you
